lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: O come ye O come ye to Bethlehem

lyrics.label: Chorus
lines: O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him
O come let us adore Him

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Jesus to Thee be all glory giv'n

lyrics.label: Verse 1
lines: Away in a manger no crib for a bed
The little Lord Jesus laid down His sweet head
The stars in the bright sky look down where He lay
The little Lord Jesus asleep on the hay

lyrics.label: Verse 2
lines: The cattle are lowing the Baby awakes
But little Lord Jesus no crying He makes
I love Thee Lord Jesus look down from the sky
And stay by my cradle 'til morning is nigh

lyrics.label: Verse 3
lines: Be near me Lord Jesus I ask Thee to stay
Close by me forever and love me I pray
Bless all the dear children in Thy tender care
And fit us for Heaven to live with Thee there
And fit us for Heaven to live with Thee there
